column2: The first wave of the enemy is destroyed. But it's probably not all they've got, so be on your guard.
Henry, Sarah, what is the status on the ship?
We're holding out. Don't forget about giving orders to repair the damage and it'll all be great, Cap.
What about them? We'll cool them and reload them now that we have time, and we'll be ready again. Don't worry, it's all under control.
Great. I don't think the enemy will keep us waiting long.
